nodes.text: The Qonto system was a star system that was located near the Braxant sector, within the Wild Space region of the galaxy. The system was connected by the Braxant Run hyperlane to the Xerton and Bastion systems, and it was home to the sentient Qonto species.
The Qonto system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square J-3.
